'''Gondamon''' is a city in the [[Ered Luin]] at the midway point between [[Thorin's Hall]] and [[Duillond]] in the game ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.

==History==
Gondamon was first founded by the survivors of the Fall of [[Edhelion]]. After the Elves left it for [[Duillond]], the Dwarves settled here and made it to their liking.<ref>{{LOTROW|Places of the Dwarves|2025-08-13}}</ref> During the War of the Ring the lord of Gondamon was [[Mathi Stouthand]], who became lord by fighting in the War of the [[Durin's Folk|Longbeards]] and the [[Dourhands]]. 

==Etymology==
The city has a [[Sindarin]] name, thanks to it's former Elven inhabitants: ''Gondamon'', which means "Hill of Stone" with ''gond'' meaning "stone"<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''gond''</ref> and ''amon'' meaning "hill".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''amon''</ref>
